Subjects: Christ, wounds of; prayers, to Christ
_description: A general Prayer — five monorhyming quatrains

BLHar2406.First Lines:
Ihesus þat suffredest woundes smertIn hed body hondys feet and
                    hert…
BLHar2406.Last Lines:
…Confort al synful seke & soryAnd ouer al cristyn soules
                    have mercy
